identity.name: Scarlette Photography
principles: Bold Typography: Text is an image. Use it big.
Color Blocking: Immersive sections over white space.
Motion: Parallax and smooth scroll (Lenis) are mandatory.

usage.h1: font-['Syne'] font-extrabold text-6xl md:text-8xl uppercase tracking-tighter leading-[0.9]

strategies.accents: Use Terracotta for CTAs and highlights.

layout_strategies.grid_system: The 'Tetris' Grid (Mode A). Avoid equal columns. Use col-span-4 vs col-span-8.
layout_strategies.spacing: Aggressive. Use py-24 or py-32 for section gaps.
layout_strategies.containers: Max-width-screen-2xl for full impact, but keep text readable in max-w-3xl blocks.

Hero.structure: Full-screen height (h-screen). Background image with heavy overlay or parallax. Massive centered text 'SCARLETTE'.
Hero.interaction: Text reveals on load. Scroll-triggered parallax on image.

LanguageSwitcher.structure: Fixed floating pill at bottom-right or integrated in Nav. Minimalist text 'EN / FR'.
LanguageSwitcher.style: backdrop-blur-md bg-white/10 border border-white/20 rounded-full px-4 py-2 text-xs font-bold uppercase hover:bg-white/20 transition-all

Services.structure: Sticky Horizontal Scroll or Massive Accordion. Do not use 4 cards in a row.
Services.style: Each service gets a full viewport height or a large horizontal panel.

Gallery.structure: Masonry layout. Mix portrait and landscape. Some images overlap.
Gallery.hover: Images scale down slightly (95%) and reveal title on hover.

Contact.structure: Split screen. Left: Massive 'Let's Create'. Right: Minimalist form.
Contact.form_style: Transparent inputs with bottom border only. No boxes.

guidelines: Use staggered entrance for text lines.
Images should have a slow zoom-out effect (scale 1.1 -> 1.0) on scroll.
Buttons should have a magnetic effect if possible.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients. Use solid, bold colors.
Avoid 'Card' components with shadows. Use flat layouts with borders or just spacing.
Ensure text contrast is high (WCAG AA).
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Update tailwind.config.js with the new fonts (Syne, Manrope) and colors.
3. Create a 'LanguageContext' to manage EN/FR state globally.
4. Build the 'Hero' section first to establish the vibe.
5. Use the provided image URLs. Do not use placeholders.
